notes: This map illustrates density of satellite-detected shelters and other buildings at the Qah Internally Displaced Persons settlement in Dana Subdistrict, Harem District, Idlib Governorate, Syria. As of 12 July 2017, a total of 18,547 shelters were detected as well as 333 infrastructure and support buildings within the displayed area. This represents an increase in structures of over 73% since the previous UNOSAT analysis using an image from 22 May 2015, when the number of shelters was 10,898 and the number of infrastructure and support buildings was 48 within the same area.The full UNOSAT analysis detected 45,591 structures over the Dana Subdistrict as of 12 July 2017. This is a preliminary analysis and has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR-UNOSAT.
